entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
